entry.title: Roseburg man indicted for murder of Grants Pass man
entry.summary: Gauge Douglas James Main was indicted Friday in a Douglas County Courtroom on charges relating to a shooting that left one Grants Pass man dead and another wounded.

entry.title: 12 common vaping myths dispelled

entry.title: Former deputy arrested for embezzlement
entry.summary: Peter Collins, a former Douglas County Sheriff Correction Deputy, was arrested Tuesday for alleged embezzling more than $100,000 from the Douglas County Law Enforcement Association.
